comments: Tests covering the use of the array returning UDFs.

tests.name: entries sorted
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (col1 VARCHAR, col2 ARRAY<VARCHAR>) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM BIG_STRUCT AS SELECT {f1 COL1, f2 COL2, f3 SUBSTRING(col1, 2)} AS s FROM INPUT;
